get.description: This API fetches the configuration details and permissions defined for the profile of the currently logged in user.
This API fetches the details of a particular profile.

patch.description: This API updates the details of an existing profile.

get.description: This API fetches the number of profiles configured in your help desk.
This API fetches the different permissions configured for the light agent profile.

post.description: This API replicates an existing profile.
This API deletes a profile from your help desk.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of user profiles, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: String to search for profile by name or description. The string must contain at least one character. Three search methods are supported: 1) string* - Searches for profiles whose name or description start with the string, 2) *string* - Searches for profiles whose name or description contain the string, 3) string -  Searches for profiles whose name or description is an exact match for the string

schema.description: String to search for profile by name or description. The string must contain at least one character. Three search methods are supported: 1) string* - Searches for profiles whose name or description start with the string, 2) *string* - Searches for profiles whose name or description contain the string, 3) string -  Searches for profiles whose name or description is an exact match for the string

get.description: This API fetches the permissions associated with the profile of the currently logged in user.
This API lists agents mapped to a particular profile.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Activation status of the agents to list

schema.description: Activation status of the agents to list

parameters.name: confirmed
parameters.description: Confirmation status of the agents to list

schema.description: Confirmation status of the agents to list

value.name: Support Administrator
value.description: Set the privileges for support administrators.

data.name: Support Administrator
data.description: Set the privileges for support administrators.

data.name: Light Agent
data.description: Set the privilege for light agents

data.name: Newbie Agent
data.description: Set the privileges for new agents.

data.name: Help Center
data.description: This profile will have the permissions of End Users

data.name: Agent
data.description: Set the privileges for standard agents

data.name: Supervisor
data.description: Set the privileges for supervisory users.

data.name: Support Manager
data.description: Set the privileges for managerial users.

default.name: default
default.description: Key that denotes whether the profiles must be default profiles or custom profiles

schema.description: Key that denotes whether the profiles must be default profiles or custom profiles

visible.name: visible
visible.description: Key that filters profiles according to their visibility in the UI

schema.description: Key that filters profiles according to their visibility in the UI

value.name: Agent Advisors
value.description: Advisors from CRM to assist the Support Agents.

value.name: Admin Advisors
value.description: Advisors from management to assist the Support Administrators.
